title: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description: Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors. a. Multiple selection could be enabled. c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked (default) (see perspectives). NOTES: KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also: f. Need a width hint for the dialog. g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same? I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release. KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g.
OB: The default entry in the associated editors list is not marked as (default). The File editors Pref page grows in height when it is selected, unlike other pages.
EB: The default entry in the associated editors list should be marked as (default). The File editors Pref page should not grow in height when it is selected, just like other pages.
SR: MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06) 1. Open the preference page and go to Workbench > File Editors. 2. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry. 3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' and verify that there is still no selection. 4. Press OK. The selected external editor should now be added.
